item.title: Use Mold Linker in Rust
item.description: Use Mold Linker in Rust Mold linker is a fast and memory-efficient linker. It is a drop-in replacement for GNU ld and lld. It is a good choice for Rust projects. (5x faster than GNU ld and 2x faster than lld) Add the following to your Cargo config at YOUR_WORKSPACE/.cargo/config.toml: [target.x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu] linker = "clang" rustflags = ["-C", "link-arg=-fuse-ld=/usr/bin/mold"] mold does not yet support MacOS, but can use zld as an alternative: brew install michaeleisel/zld/zld
